snippet.title: The Oregon Trail | Coming Soon to the Epic Games Store and GOG.com
snippet.description:
The Oregon Trail is coming to the Epic Games Store and GOG.com on July 4th.

Brave the challenges of pioneer life—survive blizzards, broken limbs, snakebites, and more as you strive to reach Oregon before winter.

Wishlist on the Epic Games Store now ➡️ https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/the-oregon-trail-60efa0

Learn more about the game ➡️ https://theoregontrail-game.com/
******************************
Don't forget to SUBSCRIBE ►https://gmlft.co/Subscribe-Gameloft-Y​​...

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com​​
